snippet.title: Pillars of Dust Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Pillars of Dust is a retro 8-bit style RPG for PC. Meet quirky characters, collect nuggets, and discover your dust-iny!
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1144140/Pillars_of_Dust/

Trailer credit: Ryan Bergman https://www.facebook.com/ryancbergman/
